messages.content: 9-1-1, what's your emergency?
850 Highland Boulevard at the old convent. There's a fire.
There's a fire at what address, ma'am?
850 Highland Boulevard, but they have to come in through Columbia. It's the old convent.
What's on fire?
The house. We have an old house and it's burning down.
Okay, is this in Staten Island?
Staten Island.
What streets is that in between?
It's between Sand Lane and you have to take Highland Boulevard, make a right on Fingerboard and a right on Columbia.
Okay, ma'am, are you sure the building number is 850?
Am I sure? It's 850. That's the school. They have to go past the school, go around, make the right on Fingerboard and right on Columbia, but please hurry because it's urgent.
Okay, that range number is not appropriate for me, so can you give me the cross streets?
Highland Boulevard between what and what?
Are you inside the location that's on fire, ma'am?
No, but please hurry.
Ma'am, tell me Highland Boulevard between what and what?
Highland Boulevard and it's on Sand Lane and you have to go. It's Highland Boulevard. Please hurry.
Ma'am, is there someone else there I could speak to?
No, I think I'm the only one in the house because we just moved.
Okay, ma'am. I need you to relax so I can get some help there. It's Highland Boulevard, Sand Lane, and what?
No, not Sand Lane. Highland Boulevard. You have to pass 850 Highland Boulevard, make a right on Fingerboard and a right on Columbia.
Is that West Fingerboard Road?
No, Fingerboard and then a right on Columbia. This is Staten Island.
Can you verify the information? What's the address?
850, Highland Boulevard. Go past 850 Highland Boulevard, make a right on Fingerboard and a right on Columbia, and then come straight up into our property.
Okay, what's the emergency there?
There's a fire in our house. We built a new house and the old house is on fire.
Okay. Is that off of Sand Lane?
Yes. Hello?
What's the phone number that you're calling from?
The fire department's responding. They're on the way.
